platform-gun.blurb: Shoot platforms on the wall that anyone can stand on; shooting platforms at players flings them

platform-forcefield.display-name: Platforms bounce off players with forcefields

level-design.blurb: A wall to climb, a platform to shoot from, starting spawn locations, a finish line, a button to dump the other team, lava

lava.blurb: Players that touch lava parts take damage

rising-lava.blurb: after a grace period, lava rises at a constant rate

platform-drops.display-name: Platform Ammo Can Be Picked Up And Stored
